summary.span: 类表示架构分区中包含的架构属性定义。

span.span: The class represents a schema property definition that is contained in the schema partition.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在许多 Active Directory 域服务配置操作中使用 ，如管理扩展权限。The is used in many Active Directory Domain Services configuration operations, such as managing extended rights. 有关详细信息，请参阅[架构 ID GUID 一](/windows/desktop/adschema/a-schemaidguid)文。For more information, see the [Schema-ID-GUID](/windows/desktop/adschema/a-schemaidguid) article.
